page.title: 10ANTHONY'S (aged 11) WEEKEND
page.content: Each Saturday I get up at 8.30am and have breakfast .I switch on Radio 1 with pop music and listen to First Loves where people write in about their first love affairs .At 12.30pm I have a snack dinner then I go out. I usually go to Ladymead Lane to see if anybody is playing. Sometimes I play block or football. If there is not anyone there, I go home. Tea is at 5.3Opm. It is a cooked meal. I put the dishes into the dishwasher and I go out. Back at 8.3Opm, watch T.V. till 1O.30. On Sunday morning I get up at 8.3Oam, breakfast is egg and bacon. 9.15am I go to Sunday School. It starts at 9.3O and finishes at 1O.3O. Sundays roast dinner is about 1.3Opm to 2.OOpm. After dinner my Dad might take us to visit relations, back at 5.OOpm for tea. Then I go out again. Back at 8.3O
